```{r}
library('here')         # file logistics
library('haven')        # importing SPSS .sav files
library('labelled')     # working with SPSS labels

library('dplyr')        # code logistics

library('corrplot')     # visualizing correlations
library('ggplot2')      # general visualization
```

```{r}
#intial measurements; t0
data_file_path <- here("data_", "2018_2019_")
data_files     <- list.files(here("data_", "2018_2019_"))

#read in SPSS files
T0_df <- read_sav(paste0(data_file_path, "/", data_files[2]))
T1_df <- read_sav(paste0(data_file_path, "/", data_files[3]))
T2_df <- read_sav(paste0(data_file_path, "/", data_files[4]))
```

```{r}
#reasons for participating:
why_vars <- c(paste0("why_000", seq(1,9)), paste0("why_00", seq(10,15)))
why_df   <- T0_df %>% select(why_vars)
why_df[is.na(why_df)] <- 0

why_quesitons <- c("To improve my personal skills", "To increase my income", "To become a (fulltime) creative entrepreneur", "To improve my entrepreneurial skills","To learn more about entrepreneurialism","To start a (creative) company","To learn how to better manage my current creative business", "To better profile myself as an entrepreneur","To start seeing myself more as an entrepreneur","Because I'm having difficulty making money from my creativity","Because I lack business knowhow","Because the time I spend on business is hurting my creativity","Because I don't have enough time to develop a long term strategy","Because I want to put a value on my creativity")
```

```{r}
extract_freq <- function (...) {
  why_df %>% count(...) %>% arrange(desc(n))
}

freq_df <- apply(X = why_df, MARGIN=2, extract_freq)

for(i in 1:length(freq_df)) {
  freq_df[[i]]$Column <- names(freq_df[i])
  names(freq_df[[i]]) <- c("Variable", "n", "Column_name")
}

freq_df <- do.call(rbind, freq_df) %>% data.frame() %>% select(Column_name,Variable,n)
freq_df <- freq_df %>% group_by(Column_name) %>% filter(Variable == 1) %>% mutate(percent = n/38*100)

freq_df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Column_name, y=percent)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

constructs:
```{r}
##Need for Achievement
NFA_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(NfA_0001,NfA_0002,NfA_0003,NfA_0004) %>% alpha(., n.iter=5000)

##Locus of Control

#reverse scoring
T0_df$LoC_0004_R <- T0_df$LoC_0004*-1
T0_df$LoC_0006_R <- T0_df$LoC_0006*-1

LoC_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(LoC_0001,LoC_0002,LoC_0003,LoC_0004_R,LoC_0005,LoC_0006_R) %>% alpha(., n.iter=5000)

#subscales
LoC_internal_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(LoC_0001,LoC_0002,LoC_0003) %>% alpha(., n.iter=5000)
LoC_external_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(LoC_0004_R,LoC_0005,LoC_0006_R) %>% alpha(., n.iter=5000)

##Tolerance for Ambiguity
TfA_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(TfA_0001,TfA_0002,TfA_0003,TfA_0004) %>% alpha(., check.keys=TRUE, n.iter = 5000)

#Entrepreneurial Skills 
Entrskills_alpha <- T0_df %>% select(Entrskills_0001, Entrskills_0002, Entrskills_0003, Entrskills_0004, Entrskills_0005, Entrskills_0006, Entrskills_0007) %>% alpha(., n.iter=5000)

constructs <- list(NFA_alpha, LoC_alpha, TfA_alpha, Entrskills_alpha)
construct_names <- c('NFA', 'LoC', 'TfA', 'Entrskills')
```

```{r}
get_alpha_ci <- function(alpha_df){
  lower <- alpha_df$total$raw_alpha - 1.96 * alpha_df$total$ase
  estimate <- alpha_df$total$raw_alpha
  upper <- alpha_df$total$raw_alpha + 1.96 * alpha_df$total$ase

results <- round(c(lower, estimate, upper), 2)
return(results)
}
```

```{r}
alphas <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(ncol=4, nrow=0)), c('construct', 'lower', 'estimate', 'upper'))


for(i in 1:length(constructs)) {
  alphas[i,1] <- construct_names[i]
  alpha_ci    <- get_alpha_ci(constructs[[i]])
  alphas[i,2] <- alpha_ci[1]
  alphas[i,3] <- alpha_ci[2]
  alphas[i,4] <- alpha_ci[3]
}
```

#Locus of Control
```{r}
LoC_model <- ' LoC_internal =~ LoC_0001 + LoC_0002 + LoC_0003 
               LoC_external =~ LoC_0004_R + LoC_0005 + LoC_0006_R
               LoC_internal ~~ LoC_external '

LoC_fit   <- cfa(LoC_model,data=T0_df, std.lv=TRUE)
lavaanPlot(model=LoC_fit, node_options = list(fontname = "Helvetica"), edge_options = list(color = "grey"), coefs=TRUE, covs=TRUE, stars='latent')
summary(LoC_fit)
```
